data.title: Beauty Hot Paraffin Hand Mask
data.meta_description: The Parasilk Hot Hand Mask is a super hydrating intensive-care paraffin wax treatment for dry, chapped, and tired hands. Our easy-to-use paraffin-filled gloves with rich antioxidants help soothe and smooth dry skin. Heats in a Microwave or on a stovetop in water in as little as 2 minutes.
data.text:
Hot Hand Mask is a super hydrating intensive care paraffin treatment for dry, chapped, and tired hands. Rich antioxidants are infused into Parasilk’s therapeutic paraffin to soothe, smooth, and moisturize dry, cracked, and callused skin. while helping to minimize fine lines and wrinkles. Heat on-the-go with this patented treatment, which heats in a microwave or hot water in 2 minutes and has 4+ uses in every treatment.

Have a meltdown: The warmth of Parasilk will relax muscles, ease stiffness, and increase circulation with 4 or more uses in every pair. Heat for 2+ min • Treat for 10+ min • Repeat for 4+ treatments

Formulated with a proprietary blend: Pure paraffin waxes, organic virgin coconut oil, vitamin e, and lavender oil.

Patented with Cool tech:

Every glove is outfitted with a heart-shaped thermochromatic heat sensor. The heart will turn red when thoroughly heated and begin to darken when ready to use.

Wrist strap/band to seal in the warmth.

Zipper System at wrist for closure after use.

Travel Pouch included for easy storage

4 treatments in every pair.

Features:
